update_plan.update_summary: The update adds metadata to the training summary file, improving the monitoring and analysis capabilities of the Integrated Learning system in the Honey Duo Wealth project.
key_changes: Addition of metadata to the training summary file
Improvement in data tracking and reporting for the Integrated Learning system

specific_updates.README.md: Update the README.md file with details about the added metadata, its purpose, and how it affects data analysis and tracking processes.
specific_updates.master_blueprint.md: Modify the master_blueprint.md to reflect the changes made to the Integrated Learning system, highlighting the addition of metadata and its impact on performance monitoring.
specific_updates.current_status.json: Update the current_status.json file with details about the new metadata added to the training summary file.
